arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS for this provider.

name.description: The name of the provider to create.

samlMetadataDocument.description: An XML document generated by an identity provider that supports SAML 2.0.

tags.description: Map of resource tags for the IAM SAML provider. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

validUntil.description: The expiration date and time for the SAML provider in RFC1123 format, e.g., `Mon, 02 Jan 2006 15:04:05 MST`.

samlMetadataDocument.description: An XML document generated by an identity provider that supports SAML 2.0.

tags.description: Map of resource tags for the IAM SAML provider. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering SamlProvider resources.
